Homunculus
Released19 February 2007 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceAlchemised Being
LocationTower of Life south of Ardougne
QuestTower of Life
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineDuring quest: It looks pretty unhappy.
After quest: Is it male or female?
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3588,3589,3590

The Homunculus is a beast only encountered during Tower of Life. It was created from the essence of life in the tower. During the quest, three alchemists torture it and eventually the Homunculus gets set free. It creates monsters for the player to kill in Creature Creation.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Homunculus is Latin for 'little man' and references the creation of a miniature human being in alchemy. This is contrary to the Homunculus's design, with it being taller than humans.
